position: Senior Product Manager @Yubi | Ex - Product @ Revolut, INDmoney, Reliance Jio , EXL | IIM L | NIT Nagpur

experience.title: Technical Product Manager
experience.description: 1.  Led the development of  Credit Fraud Verification Service comprising of an advanced Rule engine, Alerting & Monitoring, Backtesting mechanism which reduced the Fraud/Scam reaction time from 7 days to 3 hrs2.Designed and implemented Credit Fraud Control on Screen Sharing Software Detection, Lending Freeze automations saving ~£1mn in losses to Investigation Scams3.Scoped and implemented various Global Activity Credit Checks for credit products across 10 geographical markets in Europe, UK, US and Australia4. Led the standardisation process for Credit Capacity & Pricing and Testing Framework unification for internal Backoffice integration for efficient management and execution of Underwriting checks

experience.title: Technical Product Manager
experience.description: 1. Managed end to end payment journeys for 1.3 mn daily transactions for MyJio and Jio.com2. Improved and managed strategies for JioAutoPay for Mobility and JioFiber customers; onboarded UPI Autopay3. Onboarded PineLabs for EMI solutions & Buy Now Pay Later options like LazyPay, SIMPL, Paytm Postpaid4. Set up process to tokenize new as well as existing (100 mn+) saved cards on MyJio Payment gateway5.Implemented downtime notification for various modes of payments, thus reducing transaction failures by 10%6. Designed and enabled recharge plan recommendations and repeat recharge functionality for MyJio users7. Revamped postpaid bill payment journey for smooth bill payment experience for mobility customers8. Increased MyJio recharges by 22% via contextual messaging, effective display of offers, user targeting9. Defined and implemented product roadmap for providing MyJio payment platform to JioMart & JioHealth Hub10. Designed and executed end to end recharge payment journey on Jio-Whatsapp chat bot covering interactive aspects11. Designed and developed analytics dashboards for respective 3rd party forward and refund transactions

positions.subtitle: EXL
positions.description: o	Responsible for the Data Quality analysis of the Model Ready Data for Credit Risk Retail and         wholesale Models for a top British Banking and Financial Services company. o	Provided model admissible data using macros and logical analytics. o     Created an automated framework in both SAS GRID and VBA, for Quality Checking the data on         relevant statistical parameters saving crucial FTE hours.o     Enabled and scheduled the process in SAS  GRID environment using SAS Data Integration (DI)         Studio.o     Worked simultaneously on multiple domains of US, UK, Germany in Credit card, House loan,         Corporate loan, Motor loan etc. portfolios.
positions.title: Senior Product Analyst
positions.description_html:
o Responsible for the Data Quality analysis of the Model Ready Data for Credit Risk Retail and
wholesale Models for a top British Banking and Financial Services company.
o Provided model admissible data using macros and logical analytics.
o Created an automated framework in both SAS GRID and VBA, for Quality Checking the data on
relevant statistical parameters saving crucial FTE hours.
o Enabled and scheduled the process in SAS GRID environment using SAS Data Integration (DI)
Studio.
o Worked simultaneously on multiple domains of US, UK, Germany in Credit card, House loan,
Corporate loan, Motor loan etc. portfolios.
